definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: The party split into petty factions.
sentences.chinese: 該黨分裂成若干小派系。

sentences.english: A fifth leader Wei Xiaoyang was reportedly detained by Peng's faction.
sentences.chinese: 第五領導人魏曉陽據說被拘留了彭的派系。

sentences.english: The concurrence of several factions got the bill passed .
sentences.chinese: 數個派系的聯合使這個法案得以通過。

sentences.english: Such kind of force upon the envoys from the political cliques has its profound system background.
sentences.chinese: 政治派系對使臣這種影響力，有其深刻的制度背景。

sentences.english: Hope for United States aid played a great part in the jockeying between contending factions.
sentences.chinese: 爭取獲得美援的希望，大大促進了各派系的相互傾軋。

sentences.english: Early Christianity starts off as an apocalyptic Jewish sect.
sentences.chinese: 早期基督教最初就是猶太教啓示主義派系。

sentences.english: Within the student body, there were several cliques .
sentences.chinese: 在全體學生當中存在著幾個派系。

sentences.english: How to control for conflict between factions.
sentences.chinese: 如何控制派系間的衝突。

sentences.english: The party has also become more riven by factionalism than ever.
sentences.chinese: 該黨也因派系鬥爭比以往更四分五裂。

sentences.english: A group of smaller Palestinian factions signed the unity agreement in Cairo Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二，一些比較小的巴勒斯坦派系簽署了團結協議。

sentences.english: Various factions of the Cabal are beginning to realize that the end is near.
sentences.chinese: 陰謀集團的諸多派系開始意識到自己的氣數將盡。

sentences.english: Some of these groups born at this moment still exist.
sentences.chinese: 那時產生的一些宗教派系現在還存在着。

sentences.english: For three years he battled factions of both parties.
sentences.chinese: 他與兩黨中各派系鬥爭達三年之久。

sentences.english: And Ma Yuan was Noda factions skeleton staff, once as close as brothers.
sentences.chinese: 而馬淵曾是野田派系的得力干將，一度親如兄弟。

sentences.english: The fete marked a reconciliation of the various factions in France.
sentences.chinese: 這一節日標誌着法國各派系達成了和解。

sentences.english: But the royal faction did not give up without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 但是王室派系並沒有不戰而降。

definition: direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
